questions.prompt: What type of cuisine do you prefer?
questions.followUpQuestion: What aspects of that cuisine style do you enjoy most?
questions.groupFollowUpQuestion: What cuisine should we try together?

questions.prompt: How do you approach trying new foods?
questions.followUpQuestion: What influences your decision to try—or skip—new foods?
questions.groupFollowUpQuestion: How do we help each other try new foods?

questions.followUpQuestion: What do enjoy most about that preference?
questions.groupFollowUpQuestion: Potluck at home or dining out together?

questions.prompt: How do you prefer your food experience?
questions.followUpQuestion: What do you appreciate most about food prepared in that way?
questions.groupFollowUpQuestion: Quick snacks or leisurely meals together?

questions.followUpQuestion: How does that motivation impact the types of foods you enjoy?
questions.groupFollowUpQuestion: How do we balance health and taste preferences?

questions.prompt: How do you discover new foods?
questions.followUpQuestion: Do you tend to try more new things if they are recommended to you or if you find them yourself?
